message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. How about we split the difference and I take 45%?
I'm willing to compromise a bit.  How about I take 58% and you get 42%?
Time is running out, and the money is losing value quickly. I'm offering you 53% - it's a good deal considering the circumstances.
